Uses of Package
org.jgrapes.portal.events

  • Packages that use org.jgrapes.portal.events 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.http.demo.httpserver  
    org.jgrapes.http.demo.portlets.helloworld  
    org.jgrapes.portal
    The portal package provides a portal implementation based on the core, io and http packages of the JGrapes framework.
    org.jgrapes.portal.events  
    org.jgrapes.portal.freemarker  
    org.jgrapes.portlets.sysinfo  
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.portal.events used by org.jgrapes.http.demo.httpserver 
    Class and Description
    PortalConfigured
    This event is the completed event for the PortalPrepared event.
    RenderPortlet
    Send to the portal page for adding or updating a complete portlet representation.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.portal.events used by org.jgrapes.http.demo.portlets.helloworld 
    Class and Description
    AddPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if a new portlet instance of a given type should be added to the portal page.
    DeletePortletRequest
    A request to delete a portlet instance.
    NotifyPortletModel
    A decoded notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) that invokes a method on a portlet model.
    PortalReady
    Signals the successful loading of the portal structure in the browser.
    RenderPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if an existing portlet instance should be updated.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.portal.events used by org.jgrapes.portal 
    Class and Description
    AddPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if a new portlet instance of a given type should be added to the portal page.
    AddPortletType
    Adds a portlet type with its global resources (JavaScript and/or CSS) to the portal page.
    DeletePortlet
    A notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) to be sent to the portlet view (the browser).
    DeletePortletRequest
    A request to delete a portlet instance.
    JsonInput
    A JSON notification from the portal view (browser) to the portal.
    JsonOutput
    A JSON request from the server to the browser.
    LastPortalLayout
    Sent by the server to the browser in response to PortalPrepared (see this event’s description for details).
    NotifyPortletModel
    A decoded notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) that invokes a method on a portlet model.
    NotifyPortletView
    A notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) to be sent to the portlet view (the browser).
    PortalConfigured
    This event is the completed event for the PortalPrepared event.
    PortalLayoutChanged
    Notifies the server about a change of the portal layout.
    PortalPrepared
    This event is the completion event for the PortalReady event.
    PortalReady
    Signals the successful loading of the portal structure in the browser.
    PortletResourceRequest
    An event that signals the request of a resource by the portal (browser).
    PortletResourceResponse
    A response to a PortletResourceRequest.
    RenderPortlet
    Send to the portal page for adding or updating a complete portlet representation.
    RenderPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if an existing portlet instance should be updated.
    SetLocale
    Signals that the locale for the portal has changed.
    SetTheme
    Signals that the theme for the portal has changed.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.portal.events used by org.jgrapes.portal.events 
    Class and Description
    AddPortletType
    Adds a portlet type with its global resources (JavaScript and/or CSS) to the portal page.
    PortalPrepared
    This event is the completion event for the PortalReady event.
    PortalReady
    Signals the successful loading of the portal structure in the browser.
    PortletResourceRequest
    An event that signals the request of a resource by the portal (browser).
    RenderPortletRequestBase
    The base class for events that result in a portlet being rendered.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.portal.events used by org.jgrapes.portal.freemarker 
    Class and Description
    PortletResourceRequest
    An event that signals the request of a resource by the portal (browser).
    RenderPortletRequestBase
    The base class for events that result in a portlet being rendered.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.portal.events used by org.jgrapes.portlets.sysinfo 
    Class and Description
    AddPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if a new portlet instance of a given type should be added to the portal page.
    DeletePortletRequest
    A request to delete a portlet instance.
